snippet: “Witching & Bitching” centers on a gold heist in Spain that goes awry when the criminals flee to a border town that is known for its occult contingent.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews film Witching & Bitching, directed by Alex de la Iglesia.
lead_paragraph: “Witching & Bitching” centers on a gold heist in Spain that goes awry when the criminals flee to a border town that is known for its occult contingent.

headline.main: Jesus, You’ll Be the Stick-Up Guy. SpongeBob, You’re a Lookout.
